titleStmt.title: War practically perform'd: shewing all the requisites belonging to a land-army, in marches, battels, and sieges. / Deduced from ancient and modern discipline by the experience of Capt. Nath. Boteler.
titleStmt.author: Boteler, Nathaniel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Parker at the Sign of Leg over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral.
